# Installation Guide

= Installation =

The "Copy As HTML" extension to Oracle's JDeveloper IDE is installed in the standard way, which involves the following steps:

  # Launch [http://www.oracle.com/technology/jdev Oracle JDeveloper]
  # Select the Help -> Check for Updates... menu option
  # When selecting the Source location, check "Open Source and Partners Extensions"
  # In the resulting list, check the Copy As HTML option
  # Finish, and follow any instructions given by Oracle JDeveloper

Once JDeveloper has been re-started, select the Tools -> Preferences... menu option to select the format of the HTML that you wish to have placed in the system clipboard:
